p: In addition to the treatment of leukemia, psoriasis and colitis, modern research has found that indigo naturalis can also be used to treat liver injury, nephritis, mouth ulcer and other skin diseases, which may be related to its anti-inflammatory, antioxidant and immune regulatory effects [ 18, 20, 92, 93]. However, research of these diseases mostly stays in the basic stage, and more data support is needed from the clinical use.
